name: Brute - Young
senses:
Low-Light Vision
Keen Hearing and Smell

abilities.name: Rage - 1 Action
abilities.description: Lasts up to 1 minute - Your companion doubles its strength score when calculating its damage from its melee attacks, and increases its armor value by 2. The animal companion no longer responds to commands for the duration, and focuses only on the nearest enemy to it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description:
Melee Attack: Strength + your level to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d8 + STR Slashing damage

name: Brute - Mature
senses:
Low-Light Vision
Keen Hearing and Smell

abilities.name: Rage - 1 Action
abilities.description: Lasts up to 1 minute - Your companion doubles its strength score when calculating its damage from its melee attacks, and increases its armor value by 2. The animal companion no longer responds to commands for the duration, and focuses only on the nearest enemy to it.

abilities.name: Pack Hunter
abilities.description: Your companion has advantage on all melee attacks when you or another ally is within 5 feet of its target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description:
Melee Attack: Strength + your level to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d8 + STR Slashing damage

name: Brute - Specialized
senses:
Low-Light Vision
Keen Hearing and Smell

abilities.name: Rage - 1 Action
abilities.description: Lasts up to 1 minute - Your companion doubles its strength score when calculating its damage from its melee attacks, and increases its armor value by 2. The animal companion no longer responds to commands for the duration, and focuses only on the nearest enemy to it.

abilities.name: Pack Hunter
abilities.description: Your companion has advantage on all melee attacks when you or another ally is within 5 feet of its target.

actions.name: Multi-Attack - 2 Actions
actions.description: Your companion makes two attacks without suffering the multi-attack penalty

actions.name: Bite
actions.description:
Melee Attack: Strength + your level to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 2d8 + STR Slashing damage

name: Brute - Apex
senses:
Low-Light Vision
Keen Hearing and Smell

abilities.name: Rage - 1 Action
abilities.description: Lasts up to 1 minute - Your companion doubles its strength score when calculating its damage from its melee attacks, and increases its armor value by 2. The animal companion no longer responds to commands for the duration, and focuses only on the nearest enemy to it.

abilities.name: Pack Hunter
abilities.description: Your companion has advantage on all melee attacks when you or another ally is within 5 feet of its target.

actions.name: Multi-Attack - 2 Actions
actions.description: Your companion makes three attacks without suffering the multi-attack penalty

actions.name: Bite
actions.description:
Melee Attack: Strength + your level to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 3d8 + STR Slashing damage
